gb-renfrewshire.description:
Non-violent direct action (NVDA) is fundamental to Extinction Rebellion's theory of change and has been critical to bringing about the political recognition the climate and ecological crisis has received over the past few years in the UK and around the world.

The training will provide an overview of NVDA and is open to all, whether you are already a part of Extinction Rebellion or would like to join the movement.

This training is 3 hours long (including breaks) and will explore:
- What NVDA is and how it can be used.
- What COVID means for direct action
- What an affinity group is and why it is important for NVDA
- Practical techniques in Body Blockading
- De-escalation practice for interaction with members of the public
- Legal briefing

Join here:

Topic: NVDA Training 
Time: Jan 23, 2021 05:00 PM London 
 
Join Zoom Meeting 
https://zoom.us/j/4426947764 

Meeting ID: 442 694 7764 
Find your local number to dial by location: https://zoom.us/u/acrT6RAQrA

gb-warrington.description:
XR North Meeting for all rebels!

There is so much to share with all our amazing rebels that we have decided to go to scheduling meetings for the whole of the North twice a month.

So next week we have a visit from Anneka and Diane to present to us the new 2021 UK actions strategy. This should be a presentation followed by a Q&A session for everyone to find out the thinking behind the new strategy and hopefully get some great ideas of how, even in the face of lock down, we can come together to push for the system change that it is increasingly so acutely obvious we need. 

Everyone is welcome, please share with your local groups…

 Let’s make 2021 the year that change happens! 

18:45-20:00 on Monday 18th January 2021.

UK Actions strategy 2021 presentation and Q&A.

https://zoom.us/j/94856558985
Meeting ID: 948 5655 8985
Passcode: Rebellion

nl-rotterdam.description:
(English after Dutch)
Een online meeting (tenzij anders vermeld) voor iedereen die geïnteresseerd is om een steentje bij te dragen aan het 'Media & Communicatie' (M&C) team. 

Stuur ons een berichtje voor de meeting-link of als je geïnteresseerd bent om mee te helpen met onze activiteiten.

Wat regelt het M&C team allemaal?
- Wij beheren de sociale media pagina's van XR Rotterdam (Facebook, Instagram en Twitter). Ook het beantwoorden van DM's bijvoorbeeld valt hier onder.
- Een deel van de teamleden schrijft persberichten als nodig.
- Ook zijn wij verantwoordelijk voor het vinden van fotografen of filmers, en we houden contact met hen. 
- Communicatie met andere teams binnen XR Rotterdam of het media team van XRNL.

---------------------

An online meeting (unless stated otherwise) for anyone interested in contributing to the 'Media & Communication' (M&C) team.

Send us a message for the meeting-link or if you are interested in helping out with our activities in general.

What does the M&C team do?
- We manage the social media pages of XR Rotterdam (Facebook, Instagram and Twitter). This also includes answering DM's.
- Some of the team members write press releases when needed.
- We are also responsible for finding photographers of videographers, and we keep in touch with them.
- Communication with other teams within XR Rotterdam and also with the media team of XRNL.

gb-derby.description:
For all the Rebels in the Midlands.
______
💕 A great workshop to strengthen relationships in your local group.
Learn how to hold a space for shared purposes, acknowledge and celebrate differences.

🤝 Sharing time as equals helps to create safety for everyone to explore their thoughts and feelings. This is something we can all do. This process makes us more effective at caring for ourselves and others.

👂 One way is to use the tool of active listening: learning to listen with respect for each other's voices. 
____

gb-derby.description:
🌟 2020 has been a time of challenge and development for Extinction Rebellion. The movement has had to learn on its feet and adapt to a continuously changing landscape.

💭 As part of our regenerative culture, we need space to reflect, learn and plan for the future and this visioning workshop has been designed with this in mind.

💭 The aim of the workshop is to give each person in the group a chance to express their visions for XR and be an integral part of the planning and decision-making process.

💭 Another aim of the workshop is to make a visual plan with reachable targets, so working towards a big goal in 2021 is tangible and realistic

🌟 Whether you are an active Derby Rebel, or looking to become more involved in 2021... all are very welcome! 

________
If you would like to attend, but are unsure about Zoom, have any accessibility problems or have any other questions, please email rebellionoutreach@protonmail.com and we can offer support.  Looking forward to seeing as many of you as possible!

pl-warszawa.description:
🍀 Hope dies, action begins! Nadzieja umiera, zaczyna się akcja! 

W 2021 uratujemy świat i weźmiemy sprawy w swoje ręce!

Zrobimy to razem: zmienimy świat, wprowadzimy trwałe zmiany i zbudujemy lepszą przyszłość dla wszystkich. Mamy jeszcze szansę uchronić naszą planetę przed klimatyczną katastrofą.

Dlatego w 2021:
- wezmę udział w akcji nieposłuszeństwa obywatelskiego, bo czas jest działać teraz!
- znajdę lub zbuduję grupę lokalną w swojej okolicy, zmienimy ten świat razem!
- wezmę udział lub stworzę artywistyczne wydarzenie - akcję pełną sztuki na ulicach swojego miasta, bo walczymy o lepszą, wspólną przyszłość!
- zasypię plakatami wszystkie wolne ściany, bo trzeba mówić prawdę o stanie klimatu i naszej planety!
- będę działać dla kultury regeneracji - kultury, która jest zdrowa, wytrzymała i odpowiada na bieżące potrzeby! 
- doprowadzę do zmiany toksycznego systemu, bo trzeba demokracji deliberatywnej, ponad politycznymi interesami! Panele obywatelskie TERAZ!
- będziemy działać razem, bo siła tkwi w rękach ludzi! 💪

DOŁĄCZ DO XR:
https://dolacz.xr.org.pl/

Hope dies, action begins! Tak śpiewała Lulu Henn podczas berlińskiej rebelii. Posłuchajcie i zobaczcie: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5eVV0MCY4H4 

Więcej informacji o globalnym ruchu Extinction Rebellion i jak uratować świat z miejsca, w którym jesteś znajdziesz tutaj:
https://www.extinctionrebellion.pl/

Postulaty i wartości XR znajdziesz tutaj:
https://www.extinctionrebellion.pl/pl/about-us/

Możesz ustawić cykliczne wsparcie finansowe dla Extinction Rebellion Polska tutaj:
https://zrzutka.pl/dhjgc8
Cykliczne wsparcie pozwala planować i organizować działania ruchu.

Jeśli chcesz zasilić XR, wesprzeć swoją wiedzą czy działaniem i dołączyć do grup roboczych, tworzących struktury ruchu klimatycznego napisz do nas: https://m.me/xrpolska

To będzie nasz rok!
Do zobaczenia na ulicach! 

-----------------------------------

Extinction Rebellion to globalny ruch.
Dołącz do światowego bezstronnego ruchu, który dzięki pokojowym działaniom wymierzonym w rządy przekonuje je do podejmowania sprawiedliwych kroków w kierunku zatrzymania klimatycznej i ekologicznej sytuacji alarmowej.

Działajmy teraz.
Naszą strategią są więc pokojowe akty obywatelskiego nieposłuszeństwa – rebelia. Nie ważne kim jesteś i ile czasu możesz nam poświęcić – razem budujemy potężny, inkluzywny ruch oparty na uczestnictwie. Razem jesteśmy nie do zatrzymania.

fr-pantin.description:
Pourquoi allons-nous vers notre propre extinction et comment y faire face ?

Quel lien entre effondrement de la biodiversité et pandémie ? Quel rôle a l'Humain face aux zoonoses comme le covid-19 et comment le comprendre au-delà de la question sanitaire ? L’effondrement de la biodiversité et le dérèglement climatique sont tels que la survie même de l’humanité est en jeu. La conférence "Face à l’extinction" (version française de Heading For Extinction, ou HFX) aborde avec lucidité les données scientifiques qui renforcent la probabilité d’effondrements proches, et esquisse des pistes tout d’abord pour accepter cet état de fait, et puis pour entrer en action, ensemble, face à ce qui peut être décrit comme la plus grave menace ayant jamais pesé sur l’existence humaine et terrestre. Dérèglement climatique, anthropocène, 6e extinction de masse, raréfaction des ressources, taux de retour énergétique, boucles de rétroaction, empreinte écologique et zoonoses... C'est par ici ! 🙂

Pensez à bien vous inscrire sur l'eventbrite, cliquer sur "je participe" sur facebook ne tient pas pour inscription !

Où ?
Le lien de la plateforme Zoom sur laquelle se déroulera la conférence en ligne ne sera PAS envoyé par mail, il sera prochainement communiqué sur la page eventbrite, au plus tard le jour J :
https://www.eventbrite.fr/e/billets-conference-hfx-pourquoi-allons-nous-vers-notre-propre-extinction-136254622243

Quand ? De 21h à 22h45

fr-pantin.description:
Bonjour à toi, nouveau/nouvelle arrivant.e à Extinction Rebellion !

Tu as assisté à un accueil des nouveaux/nouvelles et tu souhaites bénéficier d'une aide pour t'inscrire sur les outils numériques (Base, Mattermost etc.), pour mieux les appréhender et être guidé pour trouver ta place dans le mouvement ? Nous te proposons un atelier durant lequel nous te guiderons sur ces questions !

Quand et où ? Rendez-vous le jeudi 21 janvier à 19h30, en ligne sur zoom. Le lien sera envoyé aux inscrit.e.s par mail une dizaine de minutes avant le début de l'atelier.

Inscription : https://www.eventbrite.fr/e/billets-xr-atelier-aide-aux-outils-numeriquestrouver-sa-place-dans-le-mouvement-136931956167

Pour être le plus efficace possible, et avoir le temps de répondre à tes questions, il faudrait que tu aies déjà complété 3 étapes simples :

1) Te choisir un pseudo, qui sera ton « nom » chez XR (aucune obligation évidemment, il est tout à fait possible de choisir de mettre son prénom) ;

2) Te créer une adresse protonmail : cette adresse de messagerie (gratuite) est particulièrement sécurisée. Nous l'utilisons pour communiquer entre nous, et elle vous servira pour vous inscrire sur la Base et sur Mattermost de façon sécurisée ;

3) Te créer un compte sur « La base », notre forum de discussion, avec ton pseudo, et en t'inscrivant avec ton adresse protonmail : nous réaliserons ensuite les étapes suivantes avec toi, et nous t'expliquerons son fonctionnement.

Pour faciliter les choses, nous te conseillons d'être sur ordinateur, et non sur téléphone.

Cet accueil s'adresse à tous.tes les rebelles, quel que soit votre groupe local ! Pour toute question, tu peux écrire à l'adresse parisnord@extinctionrebellion.fr

Et si tu n'as pas fait d'accueil des nouveaux/nouvelles, nous te conseillons vivement de commencer par cela : tu trouveras toutes les prochaines dates dans nos événements.

A très vite !

cz-czech-republic.description:
Ahooj všem!

Pokud hledáš místo, kde si lidé naslouchají a snaží se navzájem pochopit jeden druhého, jsi tu správně! Kruhy empatie jsou otevřená podpůrná skupina, která je bezpečným prostorem pro sdílení čehokoliv, co máš na srdci. Zároveň máš možnost procvičit svoji dovednost vnímavého naslouchání a empatie. A taky se líp poznáš s ostatními rebely!

Jak to probíhá? 

Jeden takový kruh trvá přibližně hodinu. Během ní si každý vyzkouší tři role: 

mluvčí – mluví cca 5 minut o čemkoliv, v čem chce být vyslyšen, vybírá si jednoho aktivního posluchače
aktivní posluchač – poslouchá, o čem mluvčí hovoří a poté mu svými slovy sdělí, co v jeho vyprávnění slyšel 
tichý posluchač – přihlíží právě aktivní dvojici a poslouchá

Přijď, rádi Tě uvidíme!

Join Zoom Meeting

cz-czech-republic.description:
Vědci a odborníci upozorňují na problémy klimatu několik desítek let.
Naše planeta se otepluje. Vědecké výzkumy prokazují již desítky let, že významný vliv na tomto jevu má lidská aktivita a průmyslová nadvýroba. Chcete se dozvědět více o situaci, kterou řeší celý svět a popovídat si o vlivu klimatu na společnost? Přijďte na přednášku hnutí Rebelie proti vyhynutí – Extinction Rebellion.
Loňský červen, červenec a říjen byly globálně nejteplejší v historii měření. V ČR i jinde v Evropě stoupla za 60 let teplota o 2 °C, což vyvolalo přemnožení škůdců a hynutí smrků a borovice lesní. Také další výrazné změny flóry, fauny a přirozeného prostředí má na svědomí nárůst průměrné teploty. V Arktidě rapidně mizí mořský led a tání Grónska a Antarktidy se zrychluje.
Příčinou je stále rychleji stoupající koncentrace skleníkových plynů vypouštěných do ovzduší. Vědci se shodují, že pokud nezačneme okamžitě jednat, jsou klimatické, humanitární a ekonomicko-politické katastrofy nevyhnutelné. Nejen Greta Thunberg, i OSN a vědecké komunity bijí na poplach. Přijďte si poslechnout i diskutovat, jak jsme na tom a co s tím.
V této veřejné přednášce probereme nejčerstvější vědecké poznatky, které se týkají změn klimatu, vliv klimatu na společnost a naše životy. Ukážeme také, jak chce hnutí Extinction Rebellion přispět ke zmírnění změn a k ochraně našeho prostředí.
Všichni jste vítáni! Po přednášce bude čas na otázky a diskuzi.
Přednáší František Kotas
Přednáška proběhne prostřednictvím aplikace Zoom: 
https://us02web.zoom.us/j/83832127136

cz-czech-republic.description:
- 2020 tied with 2016 as the world’s hottest year
- It’s 2021 and our politicians continue to invest in projects that harm our future
- 2021 is an election year, we need to be back in rebellion stronger than ever before
- We need you to help us grow the movement to have the impact we need

Join this workshop to explore how we can promote our talks, meetings, and actions online during the pandemic to bring back inactive rebels to the movement and to attract new people to join XR.

In March 2021, we are planning a national action that all rebels can do in their local cities and towns. This will be supported by a campaign of talks, trainings and meetings to grow the movement and our skills to bring people to XR. This includes delivering over 15 online Heading for Extinction talks by the end of March.

We need every rebel to get involved in outreach. Outreach is everyone’s role.  If everyone does a little outreach, together we can achieve a lot!

We are preparing this workshop to give you the inspiration, ideas and practical tips you need to get involved in outreach.

In this workshop we will explore:

Using the power of momentum driven organising 
Using the power of personal connections 
Using facebook for promotion and outreach
Online and email outreach 
How to organise ourselves to do outreach and promotion

cz-czech-republic.description:
Milí rebelové a rebelky,
z předvánočního callu o Restartu pražské místní skupiny vyplynulo, že:

1. Potřebujeme naverbovat a zapojit nové rebely*ky, kteří*ré začnou vytvářet místní pracovní skupiny (především akční, uměleckou, outreach a spojku s mediálním rep. týmem pro začátek)
2. Potřebujeme vytvořit schopný koordinační tým (tohle neznamená jen facilitovat na schůzkách, ale také připravovat jejich náplň a propagovat je - pokud máte někdo zájem, pište mi na Mattermost na @amaliev)
3. Potřebujeme pravidelné schůzky, které budou kromě plánů pro Restart 2021 nadále plnit účely jako lidské osobní setkávání (komunitní rovina XR), propojení rebelů a rebelek s Republikovým týmem, sdílení novinek o chystaných akcích a workshopech.

S důrazem na tyto tři body vás chci pozvat na první lednovou pražskou schůzku, která se bude konat online 20. 1. od 18h na https://us02web.zoom.us/j/81276299700

Program:

- Check-in
- Novinky a uvítání nových rebelů
- Brainstorming ve skupinách na téma „Jak nejlépe propagovat XR akce”
- Workshop propagace a outreache s praktickým výsledkem vytvoření jednorázových pracovních skupinek na propagaci náborových akcí (Buddy program, přednášky, workshopy pro nováčky), které nasměrují nové rebely a rebelky k nám do místní skupiny
- Rozdělení úkolů a check-out

cz-czech-republic.description:
📖📖📖
V neděli po setmění se sejdeme a budeme si číst.

Máš oblíbený článek nebo úryvek z literatury o klimatu? Takový, který Ti řekl, jak tragická je naše situace, který Ti nedá spát nebo ten, co Tě přiměl k akci? Nebo naopak takový, ze kterého čerpáš naději, že ještě není vše ztraceno a má cenu se dále snažit o budoucnost života na naší planetě?

Napiš nám, o který text jde a pak nám ho přijď přečíst!

🌲🌳🌴
Pokud nechceš sám číst, můžeš nám poslat vybraný text a v čítárně ho přečte někdo za tebe.
Výběr textu není příliš omezen. Stačí, když se bude týkat tématu klimatické krize, bude se dotýkat i Tebe osobně a bude v češtině nebo slovenštině. Může být z odborné literatury, beletrie nebo třeba poezie.
Vybírej z již publikovaných textů, ne z vlastní tvorby, kterou píšeš do šuplíku. Na tu třeba dojde později, až budeme akci opakovat.

✉️
Pokud se rozhodneš aktivně zúčastnit (číst) napiš, prosíme, zprávu této naší stránce Extinction Rebellion Brno.

⏱
Co se týče délky, rádi bychom, aby jeden příspěvek trval kolem 5 minut, rozhodně ne déle než 10 minut. Je-li text delší, vyber tu nejvíce údernou pasáž, která nejlépe shrnuje, co Tě oslovilo. Rádi bychom totiž, aby prostor dostalo co nejvíce zájemců.

🗯
Součástí večera bude i reflexe čtených textů, které se budou moci zúčastnit všichni přítomní.

💚🌍📖
Uslyšíme se v neděli 24.1.2021 v 17 hodin. Odkaz na připojení je přímo zde v události.

de-stuttgart.description:
Register here: 
https://forms.organise.earth/index.php?r=survey/index&sid=369134&lang=en 

This online gathering aims to explore cultural difference, Western culture, colonisation, modern societies as well as Indigenous worldviews, perspectives and philosophies from around the world, including Australia, Africa, New Zealand and the Americas. 

Practical decolonial actions that flow from these perspectives will also be considered along with potential emergent decolonial futures. Formats will include presentations, interactive exercises in small breakout groups, and general questions and discussion.

This gathering will be hosted by XR Global Support Trainings and Regen 101 Working Group and will be facilitated by Dr. Yin Paradies, an Aboriginal-Asian-Anglo Australian of the Wakaya people from the Gulf of Carpentaria. He is a Professor of Race Relations at Deakin University, where he conducts research on racism and anti-racism as well as teaching and researching Indigenous knowledges and decoloniality. Yin is a climate and ecological activist who is committed to understanding and interrupting the devastating impacts of modern societies. 

He seeks meaningful mutuality of becoming and embodied kinship with all life through transformed ways of knowing, being, and doing that are grounded in wisdom, humility, respect, and generosity. He is a current Moora Moora resident, having moved to the mountain in 2020 to be in community, cultivate a closer connection to Country and engage in an ethos of down-shifted collective sufficiency, voluntary simplicity, frugality, direct democracy, and radical localisation.

While this is a "free" event we do invite participants to engage in the gift economy to support a local community climate change food growing group. 

Feel free to do so here:  PayPal.Me/YinParadies

Register here: 
https://forms.organise.earth/index.php?r=survey/index&sid=369134&lang=en

us-pittsburgh.description:
ECO-ANXIETY
Empathy Cafe around the Regen 101 Workshop
------------------------------------------------------

Every last Saturday of the month, we sit together and share thoughts and feelings around material from the workshop REGEN 101, developed by Christie Wilson MGT, psychotherapist, and ecological activist.

You can download the Regen 101 Booklet here: https://ausrebellion.earth/docs/Regen101.pdf

We use the Empathy Circle format in our sharing. The method (by Edwin Rutsch) is simple and easy to learn. Each person has an opportunity to speak and be heard.

All are welcome, and we hope to see you there! 

-----------------------------------
LAST SATURDAY of the MONTH
at 9-11 am UTC - to calculate your timezone: https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/converter.html?iso=202101307T080000&p1=1440   

ONLINE: use Zoom App with the Meeting ID: 832 2890 0002 and Passcode: 912788 or click the link: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/83228900002?pwd=TTYzREwxVTNQNkRuTW1lSnB1UE9yZz09

DIAL by your location and enter Meeting ID - to find your local number: https://us02web.zoom.us/u/kepKNs8785

If you want to learn more about Empathy Circle before the call, you may watch 9 min. video (https://youtu.be/wyKW7Jebgck) but it is not absolutely necessary.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
The full schedule of Open Calls by XR Regenerative Cultures Global Support:  http://bit.ly/XR_OpenRegenCalls

us-southern-vermont.description:
Join Extinction Rebellion Vermont this winter as we read "All We Can Save: Truth, Courage, and Solutions for the Climate Crisis," edited by Ayana Elizabeth Johnson & Katharine K. Wilkinson. A collection of "provocative and illuminating essays from women at the forefront of the climate movement who are harnessing truth, courage, and solutions to lead humanity forward."

Register here: https://forms.gle/dv2vLn1jQ7cSPcHW8

Details:

Wednesdays, 6:30 - 7:30pm, February 3, 10, 17, 24, March 3, 10, 17, 24, 31, April  7

Meet weekly via Zoom for 60 minutes over 10 weeks, reading a section of the book prior to each meeting (~40 pages/week).

**Space is limited to provide space for rich dialogue. If there is enough interest, we may offer an additional meeting time (likely a weekend morning).

Register here: https://forms.gle/dv2vLn1jQ7cSPcHW8

More about the book: "There is a renaissance blooming in the climate movement: leadership that is more characteristically feminine and more faithfully feminist, rooted in compassion, connection, creativity, and collaboration. While it’s clear that women and girls are vital voices and agents of change for this planet, they are too often missing from the proverbial “table.” More than a problem of bias, it’s a dynamic that sets us up for failure. To change everything, we need everyone. Intermixing essays with poetry and art, this book is both a balm and a guide for knowing and holding what has been done to the world, while bolstering our resolve never to give up on each other or our collective future. We must summon truth, courage, and solutions, to turn away from the brink and toward life-giving possibility. Curated by two climate leaders, this book is a collection and celebration of visionaries who are leading us on a path toward all we can save." (Source: allwecansave.earth)

pl-lublin.description:
🍀 Hope dies, action begins! Nadzieja umiera, zaczyna się akcja! 

W 2021 uratujemy świat i weźmiemy sprawy w swoje ręce!

Zrobimy to razem: zmienimy świat, wprowadzimy trwałe zmiany i zbudujemy lepszą przyszłość dla wszystkich. Mamy jeszcze szansę uchronić naszą planetę przed klimatyczną katastrofą.

Dlatego w 2021:
- wezmę udział w akcji nieposłuszeństwa obywatelskiego, bo czas jest działać teraz!
- znajdę lub zbuduję grupę lokalną w swojej okolicy, zmienimy ten świat razem!
- wezmę udział lub stworzę artywistyczne wydarzenie - akcję pełną sztuki na ulicach swojego miasta, bo walczymy o lepszą, wspólną przyszłość!
- zasypię plakatami wszystkie wolne ściany, bo trzeba mówić prawdę o stanie klimatu i naszej planety!
- będę działać dla kultury regeneracji - kultury, która jest zdrowa, wytrzymała i odpowiada na bieżące potrzeby! 
- doprowadzę do zmiany toksycznego systemu, bo trzeba demokracji deliberatywnej, ponad politycznymi interesami! Panele obywatelskie TERAZ!
- będziemy działać razem, bo siła tkwi w rękach ludzi! 💪

DOŁĄCZ DO XR:
https://dolacz.xr.org.pl/

Hope dies, action begins! Tak śpiewała Lulu Henn podczas berlińskiej rebelii. Posłuchajcie i zobaczcie: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5eVV0MCY4H4 

Więcej informacji o globalnym ruchu Extinction Rebellion i jak uratować świat z miejsca, w którym jesteś znajdziesz tutaj:
https://www.extinctionrebellion.pl/

Postulaty i wartości XR znajdziesz tutaj:
https://www.extinctionrebellion.pl/pl/about-us/

Możesz ustawić cykliczne wsparcie finansowe dla Extinction Rebellion Polska tutaj:
https://zrzutka.pl/dhjgc8
Cykliczne wsparcie pozwala planować i organizować działania ruchu.

Jeśli chcesz zasilić XR, wesprzeć swoją wiedzą czy działaniem i dołączyć do grup roboczych, tworzących struktury ruchu klimatycznego napisz do nas: https://m.me/xrpolska

To będzie nasz rok!
Do zobaczenia na ulicach! 

-----------------------------------

Extinction Rebellion to globalny ruch.
Dołącz do światowego bezstronnego ruchu, który dzięki pokojowym działaniom wymierzonym w rządy przekonuje je do podejmowania sprawiedliwych kroków w kierunku zatrzymania klimatycznej i ekologicznej sytuacji alarmowej.

Działajmy teraz.
Naszą strategią są więc pokojowe akty obywatelskiego nieposłuszeństwa – rebelia. Nie ważne kim jesteś i ile czasu możesz nam poświęcić – razem budujemy potężny, inkluzywny ruch oparty na uczestnictwie. Razem jesteśmy nie do zatrzymania.

pl-lublin.description:
Lublinie!  

Zapraszamy na spotkanie wprowadzające do Extinction Rebellion Lublin! 

2021 – najwyższy czas, by kwestia kryzysu klimatycznego stała się priorytetem dla rządu. Przed nami najtrudniejszy moment w historii ludzkości. Przyszłość planety i następnych pokoleń stoi pod znakiem zapytania. Dowody naukowe są przytłaczające - wymieramy! Nieograniczona konsumpcja czy pogoń za wzrostem gospodarczym to wizja krótkowzroczna, prowadząca znany nam świat ku krawędzi. Już TERAZ potrzebujemy przebudowy systemu pozyskiwania energii, a także produkcji. Działajmy, by położyć kres bierności rządzących. Działajmy, by społeczeństwo zaczęło być solidnie informowane o tragicznym kierunku w jakim obecnie zmierzamy. To ostatni moment, kiedy możemy coś zmienić, choć będzie to proces ciągły i kształtowany wspólnymi siłami. DziałajMy teraz! CZAS NA BUNT! 

Na spotkaniu dowiesz się:  
-czym jest XR,  
-jak działamy i jakie są nasze cele
-czym jest nieposłuszeństwo obywatelskie
-jak się organizujemy
-jak dołączyć do rebelii 

Opowiemy także o akcjach XR w Polsce i na świecie. 
Przyjdź na spotkanie, posłuchaj i zdecyduj, czy chcesz działać z nami. 

Link do spotkania online zostanie udostępniony w ciągu najbliższych dni.

gb-leicester.description:
🌟 2020 has been a time of challenge and development for Extinction Rebellion. The movement has had to learn on its feet and adapt to a continuously changing landscape.

💭 As part of our regenerative culture, we need space to reflect, learn and plan for the future and this visioning workshop has been designed with this in mind.

💭 The aim of the workshop is to give each person in the group a chance to express their visions for XR and be an integral part of the planning and decision-making process.

💭 Another aim of the workshop is to make a visual plan with reachable targets, so working towards a big goal in 2021 is tangible and realistic

🌟 Whether you are an active Leicester Rebel, or looking to become more involved in 2021... all are very welcome! 

________
If you would like to attend, but are unsure about Zoom, have any accessibility problems or have any other questions, please email rebellionoutreach@protonmail.com and we can offer support.  Looking forward to seeing as many of you as possible! 

Join Zoom: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84753673051?pwd=cWozbmhMeFVEMHN0aFNPTXBjalRJQT09

fr-isere.description:
Avec la participation filmée de Didier SUPER, François RUFFIN, Guillaume MEURICE !

En partenariat avec ATTAC Isère, XR & Alternatiba


JEUDI 4 MARS 2021
LA BOBINE
42 Boulevard Clemenceau, 38000 Grenoble
Tram A ou C Arrêt Chavant

Réservation sur internet
https://www.helloasso.com/associations/compagnie-triple-aaa/evenements/8e-ceremonie-des-doigts-d-or-a-grenoble

Bande Annonce 8e Cérémonie :
https://fb.watch/2ag396Jy16/


La 8e Cérémonie des Doigts d’Or - Les Oscars du Capitalisme 2021 consiste en une rétrospective des séquences cultes de l'année écoulée, entremêlée de discours décomplexés prouvant que tout va pour le mieux dans le meilleur des mondes... surtout pour nous, les plus riches de la planète !
Nouveauté, les Vainqueurs des Doigts d'Or seront élus par un Jury en or massif présidé par Monique et Michel PINCON-CHARLOT, et composé de membres prestigieux notamment : Blanche GARDIN, Guillaume MEURICE, Benoît DELÉPINE, Alex VIZOREK, Alain DAMASIO, Cédric HERROU, OLDELAF, Allan BARTE, Hervé KEMPF, Audrey VERNON, Thomas VDB, Philippe POUTOU, Yannis YOULOUNTAS, Aymeric LOMPRET, Noël GODIN...
(les membres du jury ne seront pas présents lors de la Cérémonie)


Catégories officielles :
MEILLEURE RÉPLIQUE / MEILLEUR ACTEUR /
MEILLEUR MÂLE / MEILLEUR CHIEN DE GARDE /
EXTRÊME DOIGT D'OR / DOIGT D'OR DE L'ENNEMI PUBLIC N°1 / MEILLEUR EXPERT COVID


«Percutant comme Benalla en castagne ! Hilarant comme le PS en campagne ! Jouissif comme Carlos Ghosn en cabane !»
GUILLAUME MEURICE
«Enfin une vraie réhabilitation des 26 personnes les moins pauvres du monde. J'ai adoré.» BENOÎT DELÉPINE
«Du pur spectacle. Les Doigts d’Or ont passé en revue les faits marquants de l’année, les déclarations chocs, sous le prisme d’un humour corrosif, citoyen et libérateur.» LA VOIX DU NORD
«En prise directe sur l'actualité, un pastiche féroce, volcanique, sans merci, réellement tordboyautant des hit-parades pigeonneurs. Le régal total, jambon à cornes !» NOËL GODIN - Entarteur
«Encore de l'humour de gauche ! S'ils continuent on va les retrouver sur France Inter !» ALEX VIZOREK
«Pour sortir du capitalisme, dit-on, il s'en est fallu d'un doigt : le voici ! » ALAIN DAMASIO


LA TEAM EGLISE DE LA TRES SAINTE CONSOMMATION:
Mise en scène, écriture, jeu : Aurélien Ambach Albertini & Alessandro Di Giuseppe
Production : Eloïse Eberlé, Aurélien Ambach Albertini & Alessandro Di Giuseppe
Service Civique : Louise Ferrette
Habillage Vidéo & Graphisme : Kévin Drobczynski
Sélection vidéo : Aurélien Ambach Albertini & Alessandro Di Giuseppe
Régie : David Boisseau
Sculpture & Graphisme : Bertrand Sion


Retrouvez toutes les infos sur la tournée 2021 :
www.Eglise-de-la-Tres-Sainte-Consommation.com

Naszą strategią są więc pokojowe akty obywatelskiego nieposłuszeństwa – rebelia. Nie ważne kim jesteś i ile czasu możesz nam poświęcić – razem budujemy potężny, inkluzywny ruch oparty na uczestnictwie. Razem jesteśmy nie do zatrzymania.

dk-denmark.description:
Register here: 
https://forms.organise.earth/index.php?r=survey/index&sid=369134&lang=en 

This online gathering aims to explore cultural difference, Western culture, colonisation, modern societies as well as Indigenous worldviews, perspectives and philosophies from around the world, including Australia, Africa, New Zealand and the Americas. 

Practical decolonial actions that flow from these perspectives will also be considered along with potential emergent decolonial futures. Formats will include presentations, interactive exercises in small breakout groups, and general questions and discussion.

This gathering will be hosted by XR Global Support Trainings and Regen 101 Working Group and will be facilitated by Dr. Yin Paradies, an Aboriginal-Asian-Anglo Australian of the Wakaya people from the Gulf of Carpentaria. He is a Professor of Race Relations at Deakin University, where he conducts research on racism and anti-racism as well as teaching and researching Indigenous knowledges and decoloniality. Yin is a climate and ecological activist who is committed to understanding and interrupting the devastating impacts of modern societies. 

He seeks meaningful mutuality of becoming and embodied kinship with all life through transformed ways of knowing, being, and doing that are grounded in wisdom, humility, respect, and generosity. He is a current Moora Moora resident, having moved to the mountain in 2020 to be in community, cultivate a closer connection to Country and engage in an ethos of down-shifted collective sufficiency, voluntary simplicity, frugality, direct democracy, and radical localisation.

While this is a "free" event we do invite participants to engage in the gift economy to support a local community climate change food growing group. 

Feel free to do so here:  PayPal.Me/YinParadies

Register here: 
https://forms.organise.earth/index.php?r=survey/index&sid=369134&lang=en

dk-denmark.description:
(English below)

*** Dette møde er online på zoom. Følg dette link https://us02web.zoom.us/j/85234443597
Vi skal selvfølgelig nok sørge for, at det bliver hyggeligt, selvom det er online. ***

Vi har brug for mange flere aktivister i Extinction Rebellion for at kunne råbe endnu højere for klima- og miljøretfærdighed! 

Vi har bl.a. brug for folk, der har mulighed for at engagere sig i vores arbejdsgrupper og hjælpe os med at stable vores aktioner på benene, håndtere vores sociale medier, undersøge de juridiske konsekvenser af vores aktioner og meget mere. Hvis du har lyst og mulighed for dette, kan du være en kæmpe hjælp i klimakampen. 

Kom til onboarding-møde, hvis du er nysgerrig og gerne vil have mere information om de forskellige arbejdsgrupper, deres opgaver og ansvarsområder, og hvordan vi kommunikerer i Extinction Rebellion. Mødet er en nem måde at komme med i Extinction Rebellion og blive mere involveret i bevægelsen. Vi vil bl.a. forklare, hvordan vores online platforme Mattermost og Base virker. Hvis du har lyst til, at vi hjælper dig med at komme på dem, er du meget velkommen til at medbringe din computer.

Det er væsentligt at alle, som er en del af en arbejdsgruppe, forstår og er enige om vores krav og principper. Derfor starter vi med at gennemgå dem, så alle får en bedre forståelse af Extinction Rebellions DNA. 

* Denne begivenhed er på dansk, dog skal det nævnes at næsten al kommunikationen i XR foregår på engelsk. Dato for det næste event på engelsk kommer snart.

Vær med til en hyggelig aften – vi ser frem til at byde dig velkommen!
Hvis I har nogen spørgsmål, så bare skriv en kommentar her eller skriv til onboarding@xrdk.org

--- English ---

***This event will be in Danish. The next event in English will be in February. The date will come out soon.***

*** This meeting is online on zoom. Follow this link https://us02web.zoom.us/j/85234443597
We will of course make sure that it will be cozy and comfortable even though it's online. ***

We need more activists in Extinction Rebellion to be able to work even harder for climate and ecological justice!

Among other things, we need people who want to be involved in our working groups and help us plan action, handle social media, look into the legal consequences of our actions, and much more. If you can see yourself doing this, you can be a great help in the fight for climate justice. 

Join an onboarding meeting if you are curious and want more information about the different working groups, their tasks and responsibilities, and how we communicate in Extinction Rebellion. The meeting will be an easy opportunity to join XR and become more involved in the movement. Among other things, we will explain how our online platforms Mattermost and Base work. If you want us to help you get on the platforms, you are very welcome to bring your computer.

It is essential that everybody who is in a working group understand and agree with our demands and principles. Because of this, we will start out by going through these so everybody can get a better understanding of Extinction Rebellion’s DNA. 

Come join us for a cozy evening – we are looking forward to welcoming you!
If you have any questions just post them here in the event or write us on onboarding@xrdk.org.

dk-denmark.title: Onboarding Møde

dk-denmark.description:
** ENGLISH BELOW **

Fredelig civil ulydighedstræning — Bliv klar til oprøret.

NY KORT TRÆNINGSFORMAT! 

Skal du med til nogle af Extinction Rebellion's kommende aktioner, eller er du måske bare nysgerrig på hvad det der civil ulydighed egentlig er? Så kom til en vores non-violent direct action (NVDA) træninger i København.

Træningerne er åbne og gratis for alle der har lyst til at lære, hvordan ikke-voldelig civil ulydighed udføres i praksis, og det er en perfekt mulighed for at blive klædt på til at deltage i XR’s aktioner.
Extinction Rebellion ønsker så vidt muligt at alle der deltager i XR’s aktioner, har deltaget i NVDA træning først, så har du planer om at deltage i kommende aktioner, så tag en ven i hånden og kom til en træning eller kom og mød nye venner.

Træningen vil give dig værktøjer til at udføre ikke-voldelig civil ulydighed, og træningen vil bl.a. inkludere:

• Beslutningstagning under aktioner
• Deeskalering
• Politi interaktion
• Info om potentielle juridiske konsekvenser

Du vil lære hvordan man snakker med politiet og offentligheden under aktioner. Du vil lære om bæredygtig og regenerativ aktivisme, og du vil helt konkret lære at praktisere teknikker til ikke-voldelig civil ulydighed.

Vi håber på at se folk i alle aldre og folk fra forskellige baggrunde. Det er ikke et krav at du er med i Extinction Rebellion, og der er heller ikke krav om, at du skal være med efterfølgende — men har du lyst er du selvfølgelig altid velkommen i XR!

Forbered dig hjemmefra, ved at se playlisten med intro vidoerne der uploades her:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jKyJnIkf7aU...

Har du spørgsmål til begivenheden er du velkommen til at stille dem her, så skal vi besvare dem efter bedste evner!

— ENGLISH —
Non-Violent Direct Action training — get ready for the rebellion!

NEW SHORT TRAINING FORMAT

Are you planning to join the the upcoming actions with Extinction Rebellion Denmark? Or are you perhaps curious about what civil disobedience is? Then join us at our next Non-violent direct action (NVDA) training in Copenhagen.

Our trainings are open to everyone no matter your age, where you are from, where you live or how you define yourself, and it is not a requirement that you are already a part of Extinction Rebellion or that you are planning to be after. But we of course welcome you with open arms if you want to be.
It is free to participate.

The training is the perfect opportunity to learn about how NVDA is carried out in practice, and it will prepare you to participate in XR’s actions or any other NVDA actions you find interesting. In XR we prefer that everyone who participate in our actions are well prepared and have participated in a training, so bring a friend or come alone, and let’s prepare for the rebellion together.

Our will prepare you for doing NVDA, covering elements such as:

• an introduction to XR and NVDA
• decision-making during actions
• body and voice control
• deescalation
• interaction with the police
• potential legal consequences

Prepare from home, by seeing the playlist with intro videos which will be uploaded here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jKyJnIkf7aU...

It is important that everyone that participate watch the videos before the training, so we have the same information and can move on from that together.

If you have any questions, feel free to post them here and we will do our very best to answer them.


Love & Rage
Extinction Rebellion KBH

Kom til fælles workshop med alle rebeller i København!

Workshoppen er åben for alle uanset om du har været med i XR i lang tid, eller du er helt ny. Vi vil dele vigtige beskeder & nyheder omkring projekter i XR og skabe forbindelser på tværs af arbejdsgrupper, affinitetsgrupper & helt nye rebeller.

Til denne workshop vil den nationale aktionsgruppe facilitere diskussioner vedrørende det kommende forårsoprør i 2021! Hør om hvilke planer der er blevet lagt, og få indflydelse på de videre strategier. 

Der vil være pauser og energizere undervejs for at gøre workshoppen rar og vedholde energien, selvom det bliver online :) 

Zoom link: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/87380754229

________________________________________________________________________

Come to an open assembly for all rebels in Copenhagen!

The workshop is open to everyone, regardless of whether you have been with XR for a long time or you are completely new. We will share important messages & news about projects in XR and create connections across workgroups, affinity groups & new rebels.

For this workshop, the National Action Group will facilitate discussions regarding the upcoming spring rebellion in 2021! Hear about their proposals for plans and get influence on developing the further strategies.

There will be breaks and energizers along the way to make the workshop nice and maintain the energy, now that it is online :)

Zoom link: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/87380754229

cz-prague.description:
Ahooj všem!

Pokud hledáš místo, kde si lidé naslouchají a snaží se navzájem pochopit jeden druhého, jsi tu správně! Kruhy empatie jsou otevřená podpůrná skupina, která je bezpečným prostorem pro sdílení čehokoliv, co máš na srdci. Zároveň máš možnost procvičit svoji dovednost vnímavého naslouchání a empatie. A taky se líp poznáš s ostatními rebely!

Jak to probíhá? 

Jeden takový kruh trvá přibližně hodinu. Během ní si každý vyzkouší tři role: 

mluvčí – mluví cca 5 minut o čemkoliv, v čem chce být vyslyšen, vybírá si jednoho aktivního posluchače
aktivní posluchač – poslouchá, o čem mluvčí hovoří a poté mu svými slovy sdělí, co v jeho vyprávnění slyšel 
tichý posluchač – přihlíží právě aktivní dvojici a poslouchá

Přijď, rádi Tě uvidíme!

Join Zoom Meeting
https://us02web.zoom.us/j/86126770392?pwd=SDlxYjFWNThvd3NFUkRvZWlJbjNPUT09

Passcode: 418256

cz-prague.description:
Milí rebelové a rebelky,
z předvánočního callu o Restartu pražské místní skupiny vyplynulo, že:

1. Potřebujeme naverbovat a zapojit nové rebely*ky, kteří*ré začnou vytvářet místní pracovní skupiny (především akční, uměleckou, outreach a spojku s mediálním rep. týmem pro začátek)
2. Potřebujeme vytvořit schopný koordinační tým (tohle neznamená jen facilitovat na schůzkách, ale také připravovat jejich náplň a propagovat je - pokud máte někdo zájem, pište mi na Mattermost na @amaliev)
3. Potřebujeme pravidelné schůzky, které budou kromě plánů pro Restart 2021 nadále plnit účely jako lidské osobní setkávání (komunitní rovina XR), propojení rebelů a rebelek s Republikovým týmem, sdílení novinek o chystaných akcích a workshopech.

S důrazem na tyto tři body vás chci pozvat na první lednovou pražskou schůzku, která se bude konat online 20. 1. od 18h na https://us02web.zoom.us/j/81276299700

Program:

- Check-in
- Novinky a uvítání nových rebelů
- Brainstorming ve skupinách na téma „Jak nejlépe propagovat XR akce”
- Workshop propagace a outreache s praktickým výsledkem vytvoření jednorázových pracovních skupinek na propagaci náborových akcí (Buddy program, přednášky, workshopy pro nováčky), které nasměrují nové rebely a rebelky k nám do místní skupiny
- Rozdělení úkolů a check-out

at-niederosterreich.description:
Du hast unsere Rebellionswelle mitverfolgt und mit uns mitgefiebert? Du hast genug davon, wegzuschauen, was mit unserem Planeten und unserer Zukunft wegen der Klimakrise und dem ökologischen Kollaps passiert? Du willst endlich von der Ohnmacht in die Handlung kommen? Du kennst XR und willst dich einbringen, weißt aber nicht genau wie und wo?
Dann ist der XR Infotag der richtige Ort für dich. 

Ab sofort findet der Kennenlerntermin jeden letzten Samstag im Monat online statt. 

Die drei Teile des Programms: 

14 Uhr: "XR Talk  - Aktuelle Fakten zu Klimakrise und ökologischem Kollaps und was wir dagegen tun können"  

16 Uhr: "Aktiv werden bei XR"
Infos zu Arbeitsweise, Organisationsstruktur erhalten und deinen eigenen Platz bei XR finden. 

18 Uhr: "XR Café"
In einem Raum mit neuen und alten Aktivisti zum Kennenlernen, Austausch, zur Vertiefung von Beziehungen und Vernetzung aller Rebels und Interessierten. 


In einer Gruppe von gleichgesinnten interessierten Menschen finden wir gemeinsam heraus, wie jede*r sich einbringen kann und will.

Alles was du sowieso gern tust, ist auch bei uns willkommen und kann möglicherweise einen großen Unterschied für uns machen.

Alle sind willkommen. Du zählst. Was du tust, zählt.

Jeden letzten Samstag im Monat ist XR Infotag! 

Der Call findet über Zoom statt.

at-niederosterreich.description:
Online Workshop zu aktuellen Aspekten der multiplen Krisen und einer mobilisierenden Kommunikation darüber. :

Liebe Rebellinnen und Rebellen,

wir laden euch herzlich zum XR Lernraum: Science, Communication & Facilitation ein.

"Facilitation" bezieht sich auf uns selbst und auf die Menschen, mit denen wir kommunizieren. Wir wollen zugleich anderen und uns dabei helfen, über die Themen von XR und über XR selbst besser und aktivierender zu kommunizieren.  :speaking_head: 

Wir möchten in diesem Raum unser Wissen über die multiplen Krisen der Gegenwart gemeinsam vertiefen, mit dem Ziel, dieses Wissen auch mit Zielgruppen außerhalb unserer Bubble zu teilen. Wir wollen uns deshalb bei unseren Treffen

    - mit aktuellen Themen beschäftigen (durch Impulsvorträge, Zusendung von Unterlagen, Unterstützung in der Recherchearbeit),
    - gemeinsam planen, eine bestimmte Gruppe zu einem Thema anzusprechen (z.B. Leute im privaten Umfeld, Kolleginnen und Kollegen, Journalist:innen, Politiker:innen, Menschen in der Landwirtschaft ...)
    - zusammen reflektieren, welchen Erfolg unsere Kommunikation hatte und was wir daraus lernen können.

Beispiel:
Wir entscheiden uns dazu, das Thema Bürger:innenräten für die Kommunikation mit Menschen aufzubereiten, die in der Kommunalpolitik aktiv sind. Wir informieren uns selbst über den Stand der Diskussion und planen, wen wir bei welcher Gelegenheit ansprechen (einzeln oder in kleinen Gruppen). Bei unserem nächsten Treffen berichten wir über den Erfolg oder Misserfolg dieser Kommunikation und überlegen, was gut funktioniert hat und wir besser machen können.

Für jeden Abschnitt überlegen wir uns also ein Thema, eine Zielgruppe und einen oder mehrere Kanäle.

Für den Gruppenprozess wäre es vorteilhaft, wenn ihr an möglichst allen vier Terminen teilnehmen könnt.

Vorschau für den 12.1.
Beim ersten Termin werden wir mit einen Impuls zum aktuellen Stand der Klimakrise starten.
Wir werden uns auch Zeit nehmen, uns gegenseitig kennen zu lernen und von euren Erfahrungen und vielleicht auch schon vorhandenen Ideen zu erfahren, wo ihr bereits konkrete Handlungsfelder seht.
Das Konzept für den Lernraum ist neu und wir möchten es ausprobieren. Wir freuen und deshalb nicht nur, wenn ihr euch anmeldet und mitmacht, sondern auch, wenn ihr Vorschläge und Kritik zur Gestaltung des Lernraums habt.

Wir freuen uns auf den gemeinsamen Weg des Erforschens, Lernens und Handelns! 

Anmeldung bitte bis So, 10.1.2021  unter info@xrebellion.at  

Liebe Grüße,

XR-Lernraum-Team

gb-southwest-britain.description:
Join us for this month's People's Assembly

New Year, New Rebels!
One of the biggest parts of growing our movement and increasing our impact is the welcoming of new rebels. On Wed 20 Jan we'll be chatting about:
  * What was your experience as a brand new rebel?
  * How do you welcome new rebels into your group?
  * How can we empower more rebels to pick up roles?

Come join us and share your experiences with your fellow rebels!

gb-cambridge.description:
REBELLION OF ONE | Cambridge Briefing | Wednesday Jan 20th, 7:30pm-9pm

“If putting my body in the road is what it takes to call attention to this, then I am terrified enough to do it.”

Rebellion Of One is a single-person roadblock, times 1,000. At midday on 27th March (and subsequent days and times, to be agreed) individuals across the UK (seemingly spontaneously) sit down in the road, alone, in front of traffic. They wear a sandwich board with a simple and emotive message. They remain sitting in the road until they choose to move, or are moved.

Wait, what? Single person roadblock? That sounds dangerous. Yes, it is. Each protester will be accompanied by a secret support team, hiding in plain sight amongst the passersby on the pavement.

This briefing will go over the strategy, objectives and preparation pathway of Rebellion of One. There will be opportunity to ask questions.

Join Zoom Meeting
https://zoom.us/j/93264540474?pwd=cGFod0l5SXBqcjFoQVlmMkZrYnpnUT09

Meeting ID: 932 6454 0474
Passcode: 946235


📧 Email us for more information at RebellionOfOne_EoE@protonmail.com

gb-cambridge.title: Leading Listening Circles - Tuesday Workshop

gb-cambridge.description:
What is it? A one hour interactive online workshop for you and your family about the climate and ecosystems. We will learn about some of the science behind the climate crisis and what you can do about it. There will be time to ask your questions, as well as some opportunity for creativity and competition! No prior knowledge is required - just an open mind and curiosity to learn more. There will be parts of the workshop where parents/carers and children will need to work together, and you will probably want a pen and paper too.

Who is it for? The workshop is aimed at parents/carers and children aged 7-14, but other ages are also welcome. Please make sure that children are accompanied at all times during the workshop.

When and where? The workshop is on zoom on Tuesday 19th December from 6-7pm on Zoom. It's the first time we've run this so please bear with us as we try out our brand new workshop script and iron out any issues. Please use this zoom link to join us02web.zoom.us/j/81418282448 or use the zoom ID 814 1828 2448

Who is running it? We are a group of people who work in education in the Cambridgeshire area and know each other through Extinction Rebellion.

Any questions? Contact us at xr_cam_teachers_for_truth@protonmail.com.

The workshop will be run by teachers and educators. At least one workshop host will be a teacher with a DBS check. Please ensure that children are supervised at all times.

Du bist die leeren Versprechen der Politik satt und möchtest du dich für Klimagerechtigkeit einsetzen? Dann komm zu unserem offenen Treffen! Bei unserem Plenum trifft sich Extinction Rebellion Mannheim. Hier besprechen wir alles was in der Stadt und der Region an Terminen, Aktionen, Vorträgen und Treffen ansteht. Wir geben Raum zum Austausch und gemeinsamen Entwickeln von Ideen. Dies ist ein offenes Treffen für Jung und Alt, alteingesessene und neue Rebell*innen. Alle Interessierten sind herzlich eingeladen vorbeizuschauen und mitzugestalten - wir freuen uns auf eure Ideen!💚

Spielst du vielleicht mit dem Gedanken dich selbst aktiv für den Klimaschutz einzusetzen? ch-riviera.description:
Cette formation s'adresse à toute personne souhaitant s'impliquer activement dans le mouvement Extinction Rebellion.

Nous reprendrons ensemble les principes de base de la désobéissance civile non-violente : Pourquoi la désobéissance civile non-violente comme outil ? Comment s'organiser concrètement ? Comment évaluer les risques juridiques et choisir son niveau d'engagement ? Quelle posture peut-on adopter ? Comment gérer ses émotions et créer une réelle complicité lors des actions ? Comment orienter son combat pour espérer obtenir une justice pour le climat ?
Informations pratiques

Dates : Dimanche 7 février

Horaire : Rendez-vous à 10h00, fin aux alentours de 16h30.

Lieu : Maison de Quartier - Espace Bel-Air, Rue du Nord 12, 1800 Vevey (10-15 min à pied de la gare de Vevey / bus 202, 211 arrêt Vevey, Nord)
 

Prix libre

Nous suggérons 20.- en tant que donation à XR Suisse. Nous ne souhaitons pas que le prix freine des personnes à suivre cette formation: tout le monde est bienvenu et vous donnez ce que vous voulez !

Dispositions sanitaires

Nous prenderons en compte la situation sanitaire lorsque les consignes pour février 2021 seront connues.

 

Des boissons non-alcoolisées seront à disposition des participant-e-s. La formation comportera une pause de 50 minutes. Merci d'amener un petit quelque chose à manger (végétarien ou vegan de préférence), ou une petite confection de votre choix, afin que nous partagions ensemble un moment convivial.

Le nombre de participant-e-s est limité à 25 personnes par date.

Déconstruisons un mythe

Vous n'êtes pas obligé-e-s de prendre des risques juridiques pour vous engager dans XR. Chacun-e s'engage comme il/elle le souhaite :)

Pour toutes questions, nous vous prions d'écrire à : xr-riviera@riseup.net


Avec Amour et Rage.

Extinction Rebellion Riviera

pl-toruń.description:
🍀 Hope dies, action begins! Nadzieja umiera, zaczyna się akcja! 

W 2021 uratujemy świat i weźmiemy sprawy w swoje ręce!

Zrobimy to razem: zmienimy świat, wprowadzimy trwałe zmiany i zbudujemy lepszą przyszłość dla wszystkich. Mamy jeszcze szansę uchronić naszą planetę przed klimatyczną katastrofą.

Dlatego w 2021:
- wezmę udział w akcji nieposłuszeństwa obywatelskiego, bo czas jest działać teraz!
- znajdę lub zbuduję grupę lokalną w swojej okolicy, zmienimy ten świat razem!
- wezmę udział lub stworzę artywistyczne wydarzenie - akcję pełną sztuki na ulicach swojego miasta, bo walczymy o lepszą, wspólną przyszłość!
- zasypię plakatami wszystkie wolne ściany, bo trzeba mówić prawdę o stanie klimatu i naszej planety!
- będę działać dla kultury regeneracji - kultury, która jest zdrowa, wytrzymała i odpowiada na bieżące potrzeby! 
- doprowadzę do zmiany toksycznego systemu, bo trzeba demokracji deliberatywnej, ponad politycznymi interesami! Panele obywatelskie TERAZ!
- będziemy działać razem, bo siła tkwi w rękach ludzi! 💪

DOŁĄCZ DO XR:
https://dolacz.xr.org.pl/

Hope dies, action begins! Tak śpiewała Lulu Henn podczas berlińskiej rebelii. Posłuchajcie i zobaczcie: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5eVV0MCY4H4 

Więcej informacji o globalnym ruchu Extinction Rebellion i jak uratować świat z miejsca, w którym jesteś znajdziesz tutaj:
https://www.extinctionrebellion.pl/

Postulaty i wartości XR znajdziesz tutaj:
https://www.extinctionrebellion.pl/pl/about-us/

Możesz ustawić cykliczne wsparcie finansowe dla Extinction Rebellion Polska tutaj:
https://zrzutka.pl/dhjgc8
Cykliczne wsparcie pozwala planować i organizować działania ruchu.

Jeśli chcesz zasilić XR, wesprzeć swoją wiedzą czy działaniem i dołączyć do grup roboczych, tworzących struktury ruchu klimatycznego napisz do nas: https://m.me/xrpolska

To będzie nasz rok!
Do zobaczenia na ulicach! 

-----------------------------------

Extinction Rebellion to globalny ruch.
Dołącz do światowego bezstronnego ruchu, który dzięki pokojowym działaniom wymierzonym w rządy przekonuje je do podejmowania sprawiedliwych kroków w kierunku zatrzymania klimatycznej i ekologicznej sytuacji alarmowej.

Działajmy teraz.
Naszą strategią są więc pokojowe akty obywatelskiego nieposłuszeństwa – rebelia. Nie ważne kim jesteś i ile czasu możesz nam poświęcić – razem budujemy potężny, inkluzywny ruch oparty na uczestnictwie. Razem jesteśmy nie do zatrzymania.

pt-porto.description:
Workshop Online Interativo

Vivemos numa cultura profundamente tóxica. esta cultura tóxica manifesta-se de diferentes formas.

Não estamos a falar de comportamentos isolados de algumas pessoas 'más', mas sobre padrões de violência, exploração e opressão que ocorrem através dos sistemas que governam a nossa sociedade globalizada.

Rejeitamos este sistema e esta forma de estar connosco, com os outros e com o planeta.

Precisamos de culturas regenerativas. Neste workshop interativo exploramos os princípios das culturas regenerativas. O trabalho desenvolvido na XR nesta área é baseado no trabalho de diferentes autores, desde Joanna Macy (the work that reconnects), Marshall Rosenberg (comunicação não violenta), Jon young( 8 shields / restorative justice), Glenn A. Albrecht (Earth Emotions), entre muitxs outrxs ...

neste workshop procuramos identificar como podemos mudar os nossos comportamento, e criar uma cultura que nos empodera, à nossa comunidade e a todas as pessoas com quem partilhamos este planeta.

traz amigxs !

au-central-coast.title: Regen 101 Online - 3 hour Workshop

au-central-coast.description:
Register here: 
https://forms.organise.earth/index.php?r=survey/index&sid=369134&lang=en 

This online gathering aims to explore cultural difference, Western culture, colonisation, modern societies as well as Indigenous worldviews, perspectives and philosophies from around the world, including Australia, Africa, New Zealand and the Americas. 

Practical decolonial actions that flow from these perspectives will also be considered along with potential emergent decolonial futures. Formats will include presentations, interactive exercises in small breakout groups, and general questions and discussion.

This gathering will be hosted by XR Global Support Trainings and Regen 101 Working Group and will be facilitated by Dr. Yin Paradies, an Aboriginal-Asian-Anglo Australian of the Wakaya people from the Gulf of Carpentaria. He is a Professor of Race Relations at Deakin University, where he conducts research on racism and anti-racism as well as teaching and researching Indigenous knowledges and decoloniality. Yin is a climate and ecological activist who is committed to understanding and interrupting the devastating impacts of modern societies. 

He seeks meaningful mutuality of becoming and embodied kinship with all life through transformed ways of knowing, being, and doing that are grounded in wisdom, humility, respect, and generosity. He is a current Moora Moora resident, having moved to the mountain in 2020 to be in community, cultivate a closer connection to Country and engage in an ethos of down-shifted collective sufficiency, voluntary simplicity, frugality, direct democracy, and radical localisation.

While this is a "free" event we do invite participants to engage in the gift economy to support a local community climate change food growing group. 

Feel free to do so here:  PayPal.Me/YinParadies

Register here: 
https://forms.organise.earth/index.php?r=survey/index&sid=369134&lang=en 

Regen 101 workshop
Register here: https://forms.organise.earth/index.php?r=survey/index&sid=939276&lang=en

au-central-coast.description:
Non-violent direct action or peaceful civil disobedience has a long history of success in achieving large change, from the Indian Independence Movement to the Civil Rights Movement.

At this NVDA workshop, you'll become empowered with these skills, so you can join Extinction Rebellion in taking climate action now.

The training covers the principles of non-violent direct action, why it works, the definition of non-violence, a legal rights briefing, and role-plays to get you ready for common peaceful civil disobedience scenarios

gb-northern-ireland.description:
XRNI Regenerative Culture and Wellbeing are delighted to invite you to join this one-hour session with Louise Taylor and Alexey Janes on wellbeing in challenging times. 

Louise and Alexey will do a short presentation on wellbeing and self-care tools and techniques and then facilitate a group sharing on all things mindful, meaningful, and peaceful. 

Louise is a currently a PhD student at Queen’s University Belfast studying the relationship between Nature and Mental Health. She is also a qualified counsellor and coach with a particular interest in ecotherapy and ecopsychology. 

Alexey’s current work involves the delivery of wild wellness and wellbeing sessions. He has worked on a wide range of community-based projects in Scotland and Northern Ireland, focussed on the connection between people and the natural environment.

gb-morecambe-bay.description:
Join us for this month's People's Assembly

New Year, New Rebels!
One of the biggest parts of growing our movement and increasing our impact is the welcoming of new rebels. On Wed 20 Jan we'll be chatting about:
  * What was your experience as a brand new rebel?
  * How do you welcome new rebels into your group?
  * How can we empower more rebels to pick up roles?

Come join us and share your experiences with your fellow rebels!

Sign up for the PA here: https://actionnetwork.org/events/assembly-new-year-new-rebels/

Everything discussed will be fed to the Communities and Rebel Pathways teams so that we can share the best ideas across the movement and try to support the needs which arise.

This session is part of a monthly program of assemblies run by the Communities Team to feed your needs into the work we do for you. We want to hear of successes and challenges you face in your local areas so that we can help each other!

UK Communities Assemblies - 3rd Wednesday of every month

gb-morecambe-bay.title: XR UK Communities People's Assembly

gb-morecambe-bay.description:
Our regular monthly open meeting but we are being a bit different for a dark January night.   Bring a drink, your supper, a mug of tea . . . we will be having a relaxed sharing of stories about events and actions we've been involved in over the years.  XR and way before XR.  We will also focus on dreaming up ideas for actions in the year ahead. 

We did a similar activity in December which worked well.  This is about connecting and inspiring each other. 
It will be followed up in February with some more detailed planning for the year ahead.
 Zoom link . . . . 
 https://us02web.zoom.us/j/81310965442 
 Everyone is very welcome - for anyone new to XR - this is  a friendly way to meet others, for folks engaged already - a way to build our community and get to know one another better.  We are all crew . . none of us are professional storytellers yet we all have stories to tell . . . of HS2; of Preston New Rd, of polar bears and coal pits, of lying down in Market Square, of dancing discobedience on Morecambe Prom, of boats in the middle of London, of Greehnam  . . . of wild red rebels up on Clougha . . . . All very relaxed and informal - come and tell us all what actions inspired, scared, infuriated, changed you . . . .

de-berlin.description:
*** English below ***

EXTINCTION REBELLION BERLIN ONBOARDING-TREFFEN

Fragst du dich, was Extinction Rebellion eigentlich ist? Was sie genau machen? Wie sie sich organisieren und warum sie das alles überhaupt machen? Spielst du vielleicht mit dem Gedanken, selbst der Rebellion beizutreten? Hast du bereits an einigen Veranstaltungen teilgenommen, bist du unseren Online Plattformen beigetreten, aber hast immer noch offene Fragen?

Dann könnte eines unserer regelmäßig stattfindenden Onboarding-Treffen etwas für dich sein. Hier bekommst du ein erstes Verständnis unserer Prinzipien, Forderungen, unserer Organisationsstruktur und unseren Entscheidungsprozessen und ein grundsätzliches Gefühl dafür, wie wir zusammenarbeiten. Angeleitet von aktiven Extinction Rebellion Mitgliedern wirst du auch Gelegenheit bekommen, verschiedene Möglichkeiten zu entdecken, dich selbst mit deinen Wünschen und Bedürfnissen einzubringen.

Link: https://b.extinctionrebellion.de/b/ber-shg-l8p

***************************************************************

EXTINCTION REBELLION BERLIN NEW REBEL ONBOARDING

Have you found yourself wondering what Extinction Rebellion actually is? What they do exactly? How they organize themselves and why they do the things they do? Are you toying with the idea of becoming a Rebel yourself? Have you attended a few meetings, joined our online platforms, and feel a little lost?

Our New Rebel Onboarding Session (held regularly) might be just right for you. It is designed to give you an understanding of our principles, demands, our organizational structure and decision-making structures, and a general feeling for how we collaborate. Facilitated by active members of Extinction Rebellion, you’ll get the chance to figure out how to get involved with your individual needs and interests.


Link: https://b.extinctionrebellion.de/b/ber-shg-l8p

gb-bristol.description:
George Monbiot, Bristol 

This event is delayed till 2021. All tickets are still valid for the new date. 

WE will email all paying ticket holders in January to confirm the new date. 

WE will also issue refunds if required through the eventbrite ticket page. 

George Monbiot comes to Bristol to discuss The Invisible Ideology Trashing Our Planet.

This three hour event will allow George and the audience to really delve deep into the damage that big business, media, advertising and mindless consumerism are having on our planet how we as individuals can help to solve these global issues.

15 short videos or the two hour full length video availble at the link below. 
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTij8wOSJZNx2yTIo8Veeg4hkZF3nxTFQ

Tickets 
We are offering loads of low cost tickets for students so please share with friends as these event sell out fast! 

About George Monbiot: 
George is an author, Guardian columnist and environmental campaigner. His best-selling books include Feral: Rewilding the land, Sea and human life and Heat: how to stop the planet burning; his latest is Out of the Wreckage: a new politics for an age of crisis. He writes a weekly column for The Guardian, and is the author of a number of books, including Captive State: The Corporate Takeover of Britain (2000), Feral, Searching for the enchantment on the Frontiers of Rewilding (2013) and Out of the Wreckage: A New Politics in the Age of Crisis (2017).
In Bristol last year we filmed an amazing series of talks from George connecting the dots between climate emergency, mental health and consumerism. 

George Monbiot’s website  - https://www.monbiot.com
Music 

 Tallulah Rendall has been blessing festivals and the Bristol music scene for many years with a mix of folk, rock and inspirational healing sounds for the mind and body.  Check out some of Tallulah's amazing music here - https://www.tallulahrendall.com

Details 
There is a bar and cafe on site serving food and drinks so you can meet friends early if you like. 

Door open at 6pm
Show starts at 7pm.

There will be no entry after 7pm so please arrive early. 

------------

Here are some videos from the last event we produced with George in Bristol. Please subscribe to LOVE IT TV and share this content far and wide!!!

V1 - George Monbiot - What does declaring a climate emergency actually mean?
https://youtu.be/2009H__4jGE

V2 -George Monbiot challenges the BBC to go further in naming and confronting power
https://youtu.be/Wh26c_7qPH0

V3 - George Monbiot - Celebrity is the mask the machine wears. 
https://youtu.be/3v5A9GWzcvQ

gb-north-east.description:
Join us for this month's People's Assembly

New Year, New Rebels!
One of the biggest parts of growing our movement and increasing our impact is the welcoming of new rebels. On Wed 20 Jan we'll be chatting about:
  * What was your experience as a brand new rebel?
  * How do you welcome new rebels into your group?
  * How can we empower more rebels to pick up roles?

Come join us and share your experiences with your fellow rebels!

Sign up for the PA here: https://actionnetwork.org/events/assembly-new-year-new-rebels/

Everything discussed will be fed to the Communities and Rebel Pathways teams so that we can share the best ideas across the movement and try to support the needs which arise.

This session is part of a monthly program of assemblies run by the Communities Team to feed your needs into the work we do for you. We want to hear of successes and challenges you face in your local areas so that we can help each other!

UK Communities Assemblies - 3rd Wednesday of every month

us-new-york-ny.description:
Dive into Extinction Rebellion’s analysis of the climate and ecological emergency, why our society has failed to address it, and our strategy for success. Gain insight into what makes Extinction Rebellion tick during this presentation and discussion. Learn how you can be part of the action.  

We’re living in a time of global crisis. We bear witness to the effects of our government’s inability to respond to the existential threats of the climate and ecological emergency, the COVID-19 pandemic and the ravages of a long history of systemic racism. Facing these threats alone can be overwhelming.  Join us to hear how Extinction Rebellion is bringing people together to act now and avoid total climate breakdown.  
This talk will lay out the basic climate science that drives our urgency to act and outline how we can use nonviolent direct action to demand change. You may be interested in joining Extinction Rebellion or are just curious about what’s happening to the climate. Come to hear more about what humanity is facing in the next decade, what has to happen to prevent catastrophe, and to connect with others who are wrestling with these truths.  

Sign up here:
https://us02web.zoom.us/meeting/register/tZYrcOygpz0qGtwmstozdiAX8Oqxua2D-Axk

se-gothenburg.description:
XR Sverige intromöte - online

Datum: 25 januari 
Tid: 18.30-20

Extinction Rebellion (XR) är en global rörelse som kräver att makthavare och beslutsfattare berättar sanningen om klimatkrisen och den ekologiska krisen -  och agerar NU för att säkra vår gemensamma framtid.

Vill du vara en del av vårt växande uppror? Vi behöver dig!

Att vara med på ett introduktionsmöte är perfekt för dig som är nyfiken på XR, men inte vet om och hur du kan engagera dig. På mötet berättar vi om Extinction Rebellions värderingar och metoder. Vad icke-våld och civil olydnad innebär och varför vi tror att det är vårt största hopp. Det är en chans att ställa frågor, prata med oss och att hitta ditt sätt och din nivå att engagera dig. Ingen föranmälan eller förkunskaper behövs, ta gärna med några vänner! 

Vi fokuserar inte på någon speciell XR-grupp i en viss stad i Sverige på detta möte, alla är välkomna var du än bor. 

Vi använder programmet Zoom för att kunna prata med varandra. Det brukar vara lätt att få igång och det fungerar både på dator och mobil. Vill du testa att det fungerar innan mötet så kan du göra det här: https://zoom.us/test 

För att vara med klickar du på länken på måndag 25/1 kl 18.30: 
https://us02web.zoom.us/j/9023007301

Mycket välkommen!

se-gothenburg.title: XR Sverige intromöte

se-gothenburg.description:
OBS! Du måste anmäla dig för detta evenemang via en länk nedan. OBS!

XR driver en process för att nå ett gemensamt förhållningssätt till förslaget på ”Krav Noll”. Detta kommer framförallt fortsätta diskuteras under två workshops i februari/mars. Som en uppstart till dessa workshops hålls två Öppna Forum där alla är välkomna att onboarda sig i processen genom att dela sina summeringar och synpunkter i processen så här långt, samt ställa frågor kring hur den fortsatta processen kommer se ut. 

Om du tänker delta på dessa workshops vill vi gärna att du är med på ett av de två Öppna Forumen.

Registrera dig till det tillfälle av Öppet Forum du vill delta på, i rätt länk nedan:

Öppet Forum 1 - 25 jan 19.30-20.30: Registrering-länk https://us02web.zoom.us/meeting/register/tZAkdOuqqDwrHNZdOLwggZYlHGVYNgtlqFqy

Öppet Forum 2 - 2 feb 15.00-16.00: Registrering-länk https://us02web.zoom.us/meeting/register/tZ0rfuqgqjgiGNC6tfn-pZ758KgdC8Oaiqf2

Efter registreringen kommer du att få ett e-postmeddelande med information om hur du går med i mötet.

Datum för de workshops som kommer hållas efter Öppna Forum: 
22 feb 18.30-20.30
3 mars 18.30-20.30
Mer information och formell inbjudan till dessa workshops kommer vid senare tillfälle. 

Vi som faciliterar hela processen har som syfte att skapa en ömsesidigt lyssnande, delaktig och effektiv beslutsprocess som främjar självorganisering genom att integrera fler perspektiv och behov. 

I praktiken innebär detta att vår intention är att: 
1. Nå ett gemensamt förhållningssätt till förslaget på ”Krav Noll”
2. Modellera en beslutsprocess som främjar självorganisering

Presentation av NVC-handledarna som kommer att facilitera hela processen:

Itza Orozco har fyra års erfarenhet med att arbeta med Nonviolent Communication (NVC) inom skola och för konflikthantering och organisering av verksamheter. Är halvvägs igenom en ettårig utbildning i medling med NVC och arbetar som klimatsamtalstränare och som biträdande rektor i sin vardag. Itza är inte certifierad NVC-tränare men väldigt inspirerad av Miki Kashtans arbete med gräsrotsrörelser, NVC och ickevåld överlag. 

Naima Clevenhag hjälper företag och individer att mötas med mänsklighet, effektivitet och lekfullhet som ledord. Hon har några års erfarenhet av samskapande och självorganiserade processer och jobbar som konsult inom organisationsutveckling, processledning och facilitering. Hon har fyra års utbildning i Nonviolent Communication. 

HOPPAS VI SES!

it-italy.description:
🐜 Molt+ attivist+ in tutta Italia si stanno unendo in Gruppi di Affinità, per agire localmente ed a livello nazionale.
Ma che cos'è un Gruppo di Affinità e quali sono le sue potenzialità?
Come progettare, lavorare e comunicare insieme?
Come costruisco il mio Gruppo di Affinità?

Dopo l'incontro, ogni partecipante dovrebbe sentirsi in grado di formare o unirsi a un gruppo di affinità, decidendo in modo autonomo e decentralizzato la propria agenda. Per facilitare questo processo, può essere una buona idea partecipare con altre persone del proprio gruppo locale, amici, e in generale persone con cui si ha... affinità!

👀 Nota Bene: i GDA sono il modo migliore di organizzare azioni e partecipare in totale autonomia alle prossime ribellioni! Non mancare!

Ci vediamo:
🔸 Mercoledì 27 gennaio h 18.00-21.00
🔸 Sabato 30 gennaio h 10.00-13.00

👉 In videochiamata Zoom a QUESTO LINK https://us02web.zoom.us/j/3471692434


La formazione verrà ripetuta nel mese di febbraio. Stay tuned!

it-italy.description:
⚡ Per chi fosse interessat+ a mettere in pratica la Disobbedienza Civile nelle azioni di protesta, Extinction Rebellion condurrà una sessione online di formazione sull'Azione Diretta Nonviolenta (NVDA).

Questa formazione ti fornirà una cassetta degli attrezzi per l'azione diretta nonviolenta e ti aiuteremo a partecipare alle azioni XR o qualsiasi altra azione di protesta civile!

La formazione toccherà queste tematiche:
🔸 Inquadramento teorico di azione diretta nonviolenta
🔸 Esempi internazionali
🔸 Livelli di rischio
🔸 Parte progettuale/pratica delle tecniche nonviolente con esercizi/elementi di Culture Rigenerative

us-seattle.description:
Hey Earth, you're looking pretty hot today! No actually, we're very concerned...

Show your love for life on this planet by joining Extinction Rebellion this Valentine's Day at Pikes Place! We will be disrupting business as usual demanding climate action in the face of an unprecedented global ecological crisis. We will be at the entrance to Pike Place singing climate-themed love songs while writing love letters to the planet and to those lost in the sixth mass extinction. This will be a non-violent action, masks will be required and social distancing will be practiced.

Tijdens deze moeizame en onzekere periode hebben we meer dan ooit behoefte aan elkaar. Wij van de Regeneratieve Cultuur cirkel van Amsterdam zijn druk bezig geweest met nieuwe corona-proof manieren uitproberen waardoor we nog steeds kunnen samen komen om te werken, elkaar te ontmoeten, en onze beweging op te bouwen. Een van de dingen die we organiseren zijn Deep Focus sessies, wekelijks op maandag en vrijdag 10:00-12:00. Het doel hiervan is om een online ruimte te creëren waar je geconcentreerd kan werken. Dit kan XR gerelateerd zijn, of gewoon je eigen werk.
De link naar onze Zoom meetings kun je hier vinden:
We hopen dat je mee komt doen, en wat concentratie en motivatie meepakt!

Hello all,
During this difficult and challenging period of uncertainty, we need each other more than ever. We of the Regenerative Culture circle of Amsterdam have been busy trying out new corona-proof ways to still come together to work, meet, and build our movement. One thing we are going to organise are Deep Focus sessions, on Monday’s and Friday's 10:00-12:00. The purpose of this is to create an online space for focused working. This can be XR-related, or your own work. We hope you will join us for some much needed concentration and motivation!

Here's the link for the recurring Deep Focus Sessions:

nl-amsterdam.title: Deep Focus

nl-amsterdam.description:
Dear rebels,

How do you stay true to yourself and interact with others in a positive way when you address the climate and ecological crisis? What can you do when someone gets angry about it or you get emotional yourself?

Extinction Rebellion (XR) is a nonviolent social movement addressing the climate and ecological crisis. For that, we need to develop new skills that help us to act and respond consciously, with skills that help us minimize harm. Nonviolent Communication (NVC) is a way of making contact that provides insights and choices regarding how we express what’s important to us while staying in connection with others.

Follow a free online Nonviolent Communication training to learn:
- How to find personal grounding and calm (via inner dialogue).
- How to differentiate between judgments & their underlying message.
- How to differentiate between behaviours & their underlying drivers/intentions.
- How to “disarm” and connect via empathic listening skills.
 
The introductory training which lasts 2 hours will be followed up a week later with practice sessions. These are for learning by doing - practising NVC by using the four steps for inner clarity and roleplaying, using participants’ real-life situations. The training is offered in English by Tamara (www.tamaracatharina.com).
 
Part 1
What: introduction to non-violent communication.
When: Tuesday 9 February 10:00-12:00
Where: Online via Zoom

Part 2
What: non-violent communication practice
When: Tuesday 16 February 10:00-12:00
Where: Online via Zoom


Subscribe here:
https://forms.gle/6rgq87McvjZVvTDr5

nl-utrecht.description:
--English Below--

LUCHTALARM = KLIMAATALARM 🚨 
Stil klimaatprotest bij Utrecht CS (onder het bolletjesdak!)

Hoe laat: tussen 11:30 en 12:30 ⌚
Waar: Stationsplein, Utrecht CS 🚂
Details: Op elke eerste maandag van de maand vindt om 12 uur ’s middags – als het luchtalarm afgaat – in een aantal steden gelijktijdig een klimaatprotest plaats. Met deze actie wil Extinction Rebellion NL aandacht vragen voor de klimaatcrisis en de biodiversiteitscrisis en duidelijk maken dat het al vijf over twaalf is. Sluit je voor een paar minuten aan bij deze actie en laat zien dat je ook vindt dat de overheid in actie moet komen om een leefbare toekomst voor ons en onze kinderen te waarborgen.

Uiteraard houden we anderhalve meter afstand. Neem een mondmasker en je zelfgemaakte protestbord mee!

English:
On every first monday of the month, at 12 noon (when the air-raid alarm will sound all over the Netherlands) there will be silent climate protests in a number of Dutch cities. 🚨

Time: between 11:30 and 12:30 ⌚
Where: Stationsplein, Utrecht Central Station (underneath the bubble roof!)🚂
Details: With this action, Extinction Rebellion NL wants to draw attention to the climate and biodiversity crisis and highlight that we’re in the twelfth hour already. Join us for a couple of minutes to show that you want the government to act now to safeguard a viable future for us and our children. 👶

Naturally, we will respect social distancing. Bring your face mask and customised protest sign!
